column4: I'm trying to add an Alt Gr key to the Mac keyboard I'm using as it's missing one. With xmodmap I can run "keycode 134 = ISO_Level3_Shift", however this will only last until the end of the X session or another keyboard layout is selected in the Gnome keyboard configuration dialogue. How do I make this permanent?
put the xmodmap line in a file called .xmodmap in your $HOME/ directory
should be read by gnome upon login...
the file should probably be called .xmodmaprc
